Kessingland Library

Manager: Sandra Knights

Marram Green, Hall Road, Kessingland
NR33 7AH

  • Tel: 01502 741212
  • Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • Friends group: Friends of the Library in Kessingland

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday Closed
Tuesday 1430 – 1900
Wednesday 1000 – 1700
Thursday Closed
Friday 1000 – 1700
Saturday 0930 – 1300
Sunday 1000 – 1500

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: available at the rear of the complex
  • Customer toilet
  • Free sanitary products available
  • Refreshments: available in our café, run by Access Community Trust.
  • Also available: Food bank collection point.

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Baby Bounce and Tot Rock

Monday (library otherwise closed), 1030-1100

Songs and rhymes for babies and toddlers

Find out more about our Bookstart sessions

Baby Bounce and Tot Rock

Thursday (library otherwise closed), 1030-1100

Songs and rhymes for babies and toddlers.

Find out more about our Bookstart sessions

Craft activities and Lego Club: for primary school age children

Sunday, 1030-1130

Story group: for under 5s and their parents/carers - term-time only

Wednesday, 1030-1130

Children's stories told with hand puppets and props. No need to book. For more information, call Dragonflies Children's Centre on 01986 874865/.

Older people's events

Top Time: events and activities for older people

Wednesday, 1430-1530
